content.summary: A content-centric, minimalist design system prioritizing typography and readability, featuring a split-pane Markdown editor and modular admin dashboard components.
content.description: The visual philosophy centers on 'Invisible UI'—where the interface recedes to let content shine. We utilize a high-contrast monochromatic base (Slate scale) with a vibrant primary blue (#2563EB) for actions. Typography pairs 'Inter' for UI elements with 'Merriweather' for long-form blog content to ensure optimal reading experiences. The Admin interface shifts to a dense, utility-focused layout using data tables and split-screen editors to maximize productivity for creators.

component_specs.name: MarkdownEditor
component_specs.description: A dual-pane editor with raw markdown input and real-time HTML preview.

component_specs.name: PostCard
component_specs.description: Summary card for displaying post previews in lists.

component_specs.name: CommentThread
component_specs.description: Recursive component for displaying nested user comments.

checklist: Ensure color contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for text
Provide alt text for all user-uploaded images
Keyboard trap prevention in Markdown editor

content.information_architecture: The site follows a shallow hierarchy. Public pages are route-based (Home -> Post). The Admin area is distinct, utilizing a sidebar navigation structure for managing resources (Posts, Users, Settings).
content.layout_strategy: Public pages use a centered single-column layout (max-width 65ch) for optimal reading. The Admin panel uses a fluid dashboard layout with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main content area.
content.responsive_strategy: Mobile-first approach. The Admin sidebar collapses to a hamburger menu on mobile. The Split-Pane editor stacks vertically on screens smaller than 'lg' breakpoint.
content.visual_philosophy: Content is King. The UI should be invisible, using whitespace and typography to guide the eye. Interactive elements use the primary blue to signify action.
